  • Changelog

    Function reference

    Downscaling functions

    Functions to used to downscale climate variables

    climr climr-package
    climr: Downscaling climate data in R
    downscale()
    Self-contained change-factor downscaling of observed and simulated climate data
    downscale_core()
    Change-factor downscaling of user-supplied climate data

    Downloading raw climate inputs

    Functions to download climate normals and historic/future anomalies used for downscaling climate elements and derived variables

    input_refmap()
    Retrieve reference period climate maps
    input_gcms() input_gcm_hist() input_gcm_ssp()
    Retrieve global climate model anomalies for downscale_core.
    input_obs() input_obs_ts()
    Retrieve observational anomalies.

    Database and caching

    Functions used to interact with the PostGIS server and the data cache folder

    cache_path() cache_clear()
    Return package local cache path
    data_connect()
    Connect to PostGIS database
    pgGetTerra()
    Download raster with bounding box from PostGIS

    Utilities

    Other useful functions

    plot_bivariate()
    Bivariate climate change plots
    plot_timeSeries()
    Time series plots of climate change
    plot_timeSeries_input()
    Input data for the time series climate change plot
    get_bb()
    Find bounding box of data
    lapse_rate()
    Calculation of gridded lapse rates

    Data

    available climate variables and functions listing available data. Datasets used in vignettes and examples,

    variables
    Available climate variables
    list_gcms() list_ssps() list_gcm_periods() list_run() list_refmaps() list_obs_periods() list_vars() list_obs_years() list_gcm_ssp_years() list_gcm_hist_years()
    List available runs, global circulation models, periods and climate scenarios
    xyzDT
    Example table of point locations
    BECz_vancouver
    Example Biogeoclimatic Ecological Classification Zones
    BECz_vancouver_ras
    Example Biogeoclimatic Ecological Classification Zones in raster format
    BECcols
    Colour scheme for Biogeoclimatic Ecological Classification Zones
    dem_vancouver
    Example DEM
    dem_vancouver_lowres
    Example low resolution DEM
    vancouver
    Example line data
    vancouver_points
    Example point locations
    vancouver_poly
    Example polygon locations
    weather_stations
    BC Weather Station Data - PCDS
